title: HexadStatus
description: Status of a hexad entity across all eight octad modalities. Tracks creation time, modification time, current version, and which modalities are populated.

id.description: Entity identifier (matches the parent Hexad's id).

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the entity was first created.

modified_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the most recent modification.

version.description: Monotonically increasing version number. Incremented on each mutation.

modality_status.description: Boolean flags indicating which of the 8 octad modalities are populated for this entity.

graph.description: Whether the graph modality is populated.

vector.description: Whether the vector modality is populated.

tensor.description: Whether the tensor modality is populated.

semantic.description: Whether the semantic modality is populated.

document.description: Whether the document modality is populated.

temporal.description: Whether the temporal modality is populated.

provenance.description: Whether the provenance modality is populated.

spatial.description: Whether the spatial modality is populated.
